name: part_013
file: tmp_【＃百鬼あやめ４周年記念 ⧸ 3DLIVE】Nakiriayame 4th anniversary　~Hapiness to you ♡~ [mwJGZ8YU7o4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Ayame, Pekora, Marine, Kanata, and Lamy perform 'Watashi no Ichiban Kawaii Tokoro'.
MC section where the performers celebrate Ayame's 4th anniversary.

subtitles.original: 当たり前にそれ覚えてないけど嬉しかったはず
subtitles.english: I don't remember it clearly, of course, but I should have been happy

subtitles.original: 今でもだいたいのことは変わってないって言うこっちゃ
subtitles.english: It means that mostly things haven't changed even now

subtitles.original: 中身は変わっていますのでその辺でも評価
subtitles.english: Since the inside has changed, please evaluate that part too

subtitles.original: お願い
subtitles.english: Please

subtitles.original: 携帯のアンテナを光らせて
subtitles.english: Light up your phone antenna

subtitles.original: それが超キュートなあの頃だって知っていたり
subtitles.english: Knowing that it's that super cute time

subtitles.original: って言うかアンテナって何って言ってるの？
subtitles.english: Wait, what do you mean by 'antenna'?

subtitles.original: 私に付き合ってくれるの好き
subtitles.english: I like it when you hang out with me

subtitles.original: 逆にでも私のどこが好き？
subtitles.english: But on the other hand, what do you like about me?

subtitles.original: ねぇねぇねぇ！
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, hey!

subtitles.original: 私の1番かわいいところに気付いてる？
subtitles.english: Have you noticed my cutest part?

subtitles.original: そんな君が1番すごいすごいよすごすぎる
subtitles.english: You're the most amazing, amazing, too amazing

subtitles.original: そして君が知ってる私が1番かわいいな
subtitles.english: And the me that you know is the cutest

subtitles.original: 私もそれに気付いた
subtitles.english: I noticed that too

subtitles.original: だからそれかわいい あれかわいいなんて
subtitles.english: So saying that's cute, this is cute

subtitles.original: 誰かいい それかわいいなんて
subtitles.english: Saying someone's nice, that's cute

subtitles.original: 言わないで 私以外なんてやだ
subtitles.english: Don't say it, I don't want anyone but me

subtitles.original: なんてありえない
subtitles.english: That's impossible

subtitles.original: 私、気付いちゃいました
subtitles.english: I noticed

subtitles.original: 毎日何十度も褒められまくったお菓子は
subtitles.english: Sweets that were praised dozens of times every day

subtitles.original: 他よりちょっと甘くなるって前に聞いた
subtitles.english: I heard before that they get a little sweeter than others

subtitles.original: そんな...
subtitles.english: Like that...

subtitles.original: さすがにそれは引くんだけど私は言われたいタイプですし
subtitles.english: That's a bit much, but I'm the type who wants to be told

subtitles.original: もっと分かりやすくていいんだよ お待ちしてらっす
subtitles.english: It's okay to be more obvious, I'm waiting

subtitles.original: お願い
subtitles.english: Please

subtitles.original: 何しててもどんな顔見せてても
subtitles.english: No matter what I'm doing or what kind of face I'm showing

subtitles.original: いつも超キュートだって確信してるのは
subtitles.english: The reason I'm sure I'm always super cute is

subtitles.original: なんだかさ 知らなかったタイプの運命の人なの？
subtitles.english: Somehow, are you a type of fated person I didn't know?

subtitles.original: 付き合ったよ無理ごめん
subtitles.english: I went out with you, no way sorry

subtitles.original: 逆にでもそれより楽しいよ
subtitles.english: But conversely, it's more fun than that

subtitles.original: ねぇねぇねぇ！
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, hey!

subtitles.original: 私の1番かわいいところをよく見てる
subtitles.english: You're looking closely at my cutest part

subtitles.original: そんな君が本当に超ラッキーな人すぎる
subtitles.english: You're really just too super lucky

subtitles.original: そして君が何年経ってもそう思えるように
subtitles.english: And so that you'll feel that way no matter how many years pass

subtitles.original: 私はそれに気付いた
subtitles.english: I noticed that

subtitles.original: 会えないときもどんな表情してるかとか
subtitles.english: When we can't meet, what kind of expression I'm making

subtitles.original: 気持ち悪くない想像しちゃうかな
subtitles.english: I might imagine things that aren't gross

subtitles.original: それかわいい あれかわいいよって
subtitles.english: Saying that's cute, this is cute

subtitles.original: 本当にかわいいって言って
subtitles.english: Tell me I'm really cute

subtitles.original: 私の1番かわいいところに気付いてる？
subtitles.english: Have you noticed my cutest part?

subtitles.original: そんな君が1番すごいすごいよすごすぎる
subtitles.english: You're the most amazing, amazing, too amazing

subtitles.original: そして君が知ってる私が1番かわいいな
subtitles.english: And the me that you know is the cutest

subtitles.original: 私もそれに気付いた
subtitles.english: I noticed that too

subtitles.original: 私の1番かわいいところをよく見てる
subtitles.english: You're looking closely at my cutest part

subtitles.original: そんな君が本当に超ラッキーな人すぎる
subtitles.english: You're really just too super lucky

subtitles.original: そして君が何年経ってもそう思えるように
subtitles.english: And so that you'll feel that way no matter how many years pass

subtitles.original: 私はそれに気付いた
subtitles.english: I noticed that

subtitles.original: 私の1番かわいいところに気付いてる？
subtitles.english: Have you noticed my cutest part?

subtitles.original: そんな君が1番すごいすごいよすごすぎる
subtitles.english: You're the most amazing, amazing, too amazing

subtitles.original: そして君が知ってる私が1番かわいいの
subtitles.english: And the me that you know is the cutest

subtitles.original: 私もそれに気付いた
subtitles.english: I noticed that too

subtitles.original: だからそれかわいい あれかわいいなんて
subtitles.english: So saying that's cute, this is cute

subtitles.original: 誰かいい それかわいいなんて
subtitles.english: Saying someone's nice, that's cute

subtitles.original: 言わないで 私以外なんてやだ
subtitles.english: Don't say it, I don't want anyone but me

subtitles.original: やだ！
subtitles.english: No way!

subtitles.original: なんてありえない
subtitles.english: That's impossible

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: みんなありがとうございます、来てくれて！
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone for coming!

subtitles.original: あやめ先輩！4周年おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Ayame-senpai! Happy 4th Anniversary!

subtitles.original: ありがとー！嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Thank you! I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: 今日はちょっとね、ラミィちゃんとぺこらと、かなたんとマリンに来ていただきましたー！
subtitles.english: Today, I had Lamy-chan, Pekora, Kanatan, and Marine come over!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: しかも、こっちのお二人は初めて3Dで...
subtitles.english: And what's more, these two are for the first time in 3D...

subtitles.original: そうなんですよー！
subtitles.english: That's right!

subtitles.original: ありがと、本当に。
subtitles.english: Thank you, really.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、この曲はもう余が、絶対この子はこの子が合うっていうのを選んで来てもらったメンバーでもあるので、めちゃ嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: Well, for this song, I chose these members because I felt they would absolutely suit it, so I'm very happy.

subtitles.original: っていうことは、1番かわいいって思ってくれてる...
subtitles.english: Does that mean you think we're the cutest...

subtitles.original: かわいいメンバー、かわいいメンバー
subtitles.english: Cute members, cute members

subtitles.original: お、みんなかわいい！
subtitles.english: Oh, everyone is cute!

subtitles.original: 1番だれがかわいいのかなぁ？
subtitles.english: I wonder who is the cutest?

subtitles.original: え、あやめ先輩でしょ！
subtitles.english: Eh, it's Ayame-senpai, right!

subtitles.original: え、余もかわいい！？
subtitles.english: Eh, am I cute too!?

subtitles.original: 負けた... 負けちゃった...
subtitles.english: I lost... I lost...

subtitles.original: や、でもあやめ先輩、今回のライブ全体通して船長最近よく見るちょっと...
subtitles.english: Well, but Ayame-senpai, throughout this whole live, Senchou has been seeing you often lately...
